results.title: Kurt Russell and Goldie Hawn, a.k.a. Mr. and Mrs. Claus
results.abstract: Together 37 years but rarely paired onscreen, the real-life couple’s new Netflix holiday movie is an indication of how they — and Hollywood — have changed.

results.title: ‘Collective’ Review: When Tragedy Consumes a Nation
results.abstract: The shocking Romanian documentary “Collective” revisits a 2015 fire that killed scores of people and brought down the government.

results.title: Nelly Kaplan, Whose Films Explored Female Strength, Dies at 89

results.abstract: In two books, she described Sammy Davis Jr.’s negligent parenting but also celebrated the intimate moments she shared with him toward the end of his life.

The new Showtime documentary aims to present a more complex view of John Belushi, the tragically fated star of “Animal House,” “The Blues Brothers” and “S.N.L.,” beyond the stunts and hard partying.

results.title: ‘Harry Potter’ and the Prisoners of Quarantine
results.abstract: On TikTok, Gen Z “Harry Potter” fans edit themselves into the movies in a quest for escapism, representation and community.
